Articles.Content: So I just installed KSP on a windows 10 lenovo G505s laptop and when I launch KSP all I get is a black screen
We're gonna need some logs and such....
welp then I have a problem because I cant find the log files

If you read the thread I linked, all the log files' locations are listed there. 

IN particular, we'll need the output.log.  Post that to a third party hosting service like Dropbox, and link it here.

Also, confirm all your files are in order.  If you're using steam you can verify your files (somehow), and if you're a direct download, just unpack the directory again.
